key_risk_themes: ["Configuration Integrity & Validation","Security of Credentials","Performance and Scalability of Monitoring Queries","Operational Discipline and Automation"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Implement a mandatory CI validation pipeline to prevent deployment of broken configurations.","Establish and document a secure process for managing secrets (e.g., PagerDuty keys) outside of the Git repository.","Institute a mandatory peer-review process for all new PromQL queries to ensure performance and correctness."]
